record.title: AUTHORIZING SAGINAW CHIPPEWA TRIBE OF INDIANS TO CONVEY LAND

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H.R. 2952, which was received from the House and is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read three times, passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating to the bill be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
